name: The Hallway - Escape Room
description:
You and your family are coming back home from a trip to South America where you, an archeologist, discovered an old sacred site of a long forgotten civilization.
Bringing back your findings you can’t wait to start to write about it in your study.

But unbeknownst to you, you’ve brought something else back as well…



Traverse the ever changing hallway and solve puzzles and riddles. Collect necessary items to progress and find your way out.



Unravel what happened to you and your family when returning home. Learn more about the curse that you’ve brought back with you and try to uncover all the mysteries surrounding it to be able to help your family - and yourself.
